sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; function App() { return (

Contact

EMERGENCY

If this is a life-threatening emergency, dial 9-1-1.

If you have a problem on your street or private residence, please call the PWC Police Department at:

PWC Police – Central District Station: (703) 792-8555

PWC Police – Western District Station: (703) 792-5111

PWC Police – Eastern District Station: (703) 792–7200

On-site Security

Our onsite security company, ADT Security Services, conducts random nightly patrols of our common areas and facilities only. To contact ADT, residents may call (800) 716-3640. When calling, state that you are calling for an “alarm response”.

As a reminder, please know that HBHOA residents are highly encouraged to call the police if wanting to report suspicious activity anywhere on site. The police are equipped to remove trespassers from HBHOA property, and will likely be able to respond more quickly to a serious concern. Residents should call security to report concerns that are not serious or time-sensitive in nature. Please note that this security vendor, much like the previous vendor, may only respond to owner calls during the nighttime and early morning patrol hours.

CHOA Board of Directors

If you wish to email one Director, a few Directors, or the entire Board of Directors, you may send an email to heronbendhoa@gmail.com. Our General Manager will work to address any issue raised in the message and ensure the Board member you directed it to will receive the message.

*Bill Finehout // President

*Tim McChain // Vice President

*Brooke Lohr // Member-at-Large

*Jason Finehout // Treasurer

*Clint Farrand // Secretary

*Steve McKeag // Communications/Website

*Steve McKeag // Covenants Committee

*Henry Nam // Covenants Committee

*Roger Anzzolin // Covenants Committee

*Cindy McNally & Brooke Lohr // Welcoming Committe

RESIDENT MENU

  • Pay HOA Assessments
  • Clubhouse Reservations
  • Agendas & Minutes
  • Governing Documents
  • USTA Teams & Schedule

    • RECENT NEWS

  • RSVP for the CHOA Winter
  • Concord Turkey Trot 5k Walk/Run
  • Main Pool Heating Schedule
    • ); } export default App;
